title: Virgin Galactic, Bitcoin, Moderna, Goldman: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Virgin Galactic shares were on a descent trajectory; Backing for Moderna’s booster gave the stock a shot in the arm
body:
Futures are ticking higher, pointing to muted gains at the end of a choppy week. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Friday’s opening bell.
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
